name: js-comment-form-validation
title: Simple comment form validation based on the jQuery Validation plugin.

scripts.uglifyjs: find assets/js -type f -name '*.js' ! -name '*.min.js' -maxdepth 1 | while read FILE ; do uglifyjs "${FILE}" -o "${FILE%.js}.min.js" ; done
scripts.build: babel assets/js/src -d assets/js && npm run uglifyjs
